attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should provide assistance, both financial and legislative, to expedite improvements to the A14 which currently has a strangle hold on Cambridge and Cambridgeshire. 

2010 is far too late to begin work on this killer road. 

The government should also ensure that the authorities are forward thinking enough to build in sufficient capacity to make the road practical for the foreseeable future.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Expedite Improvements to the A14."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15123.asp

Prime Minister's Office
